SEARCH
Module bitcamp_superMarketManager
Package manager.market

Class Market

java.lang.Object
manager.market.Market
public class Market extends Object
A class that executes the purpose of holding product and products in offer data inside of ArrayLists, supports bi-directional menus and supports adding, deleting, removing, searching, editing and viewing of both Offer and Product instances
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1
Author:
Daniel Camuffo, Mauro Gariazzo
